name: Sweet Potato Muffins
instructions: Spray muffin pan or use paper shells.
In a small bowl combine potatoes with margarine, egg whites and milk.
In another bowl combine flour, sugar, brown sugar, salt, baking powder, cinnamon, nutmeg and pecans and stir well.
Pour dry ingredients into liquid and stir until moistened (batter will be lumpy).
Spoon batter into cups, filling 2/3 full.
Bake for 18-20 minutes or until muffins are golden.
